scripts.build: yarn workspace @app/common run build && concurrently "yarn workspace @app/api run build" "yarn workspace @app/web run build"
scripts.dev: concurrently "yarn workspace @app/api run start:dev" "yarn workspace @app/web run dev"
scripts.lint: concurrently "yarn workspace @app/common run lint" "yarn workspace @app/api run lint" "yarn workspace @app/web run lint"
scripts.lint:fix: concurrently "yarn workspace @app/common run lint:fix" "yarn workspace @app/api run lint:fix" "yarn workspace @app/web run lint:fix"
scripts.clean: concurrently "yarn workspace @app/common run clean" "yarn workspace @app/api run clean" "yarn workspace @app/web run clean"
